title:
Komik
              “It’s too precious and hard to read !!” 4P Short Stories
alternative_titles: "Touto sugite yome na ~a~a~a~a~a~a i!!" 4 P shouto sutouriizu, "Tootosugite yomenaaaaaaai!!" 4P Short Stories, 4P 短篇故事集, Bộ Truyện Ngắn Siêu Ngọt Siêu Ngấy, One-Sided Love Graduation, Punishment Game (SHIRO Manta), Четырёхстраничные истории, “Tōto sugite
author: 9ºC Ameno Anthology ARAOKA Aoi, ASAI Okuta, Azuma Fuyu, Bimita, CHACHA Goma, DOROKAWA Megumi, Fujita, HATA Natsuha, Kakitsubata Waka, KAMENA Yuu, Kashiwagi Kano, Kishirimo, KONNO Paru, ma2, Majiko, Maki Keigo, Matsumoto Bokkuri, MATSUMOTO Purittsu, Medama
illustrator: 9ºC Ameno Anthology ARAOKA Aoi, ASAI Okuta, Azuma Fuyu, Bimita, Chacha Goma, DOROKAWA Megumi, Fujita, HATA Natsuha, Kakitsubata Waka, KAMENA Yuu, Kashiwagi Kano, Kishirimo, KONNO Paru, ma2, Majiko, Maki Keigo, Matsumoto Bokkuri, MATSUMOTO Purittsu, Medama
synopsis:
Manga                    “It’s too precious and hard to read !!” 4P Short Stories yang dibuat oleh komikus bernama
                    9ºC Ameno Anthology ARAOKA Aoi, ASAI Okuta, Azuma Fuyu, Bimita, CHACHA Goma, DOROKAWA Megumi, Fujita, HATA Natsuha, Kakitsubata Waka, KAMENA Yuu, Kashiwagi Kano, Kishirimo, KONNO Paru, ma2, Majiko, Maki Keigo, Matsumoto Bokkuri, MATSUMOTO Purittsu, Medama ini bercerita tentang
                    Kumpulan cerita pendek yang lucu dan manis untuk dinikmati semua orang.
